snippet: Behind Paul George’s 39-point, 12-rebound effort, the Pacers rallied to beat the Wizards, whose bench had a 32-2 advantage in scoring.
abstract: Indiana Pacers defeat Washington Wizards, 95-92, to lead their Eastern Conference semifinal series, 3-1.
lead_paragraph: Behind Paul George’s 39-point, 12-rebound effort, the Pacers rallied to beat the Wizards, whose bench had a 32-2 advantage in scoring.

headline.main: George and Indiana Erase 19-Point Washington Lead
headline.print_headline: George and Indiana Erase 19-Point Washington Lead
